name: 2D Shooter (popeian1)
description:
Modifications:

1. I  made 5 whole unique levels, having the difficulty increase as I go. I also added different enemies as well as the levels' ability to be selected on the UI screen.

2. I added unique music for each of the levels, using the music that game with the assets for the main menu and levels 1, 3 and 5, but also creating my own songs for levels 2 and 4 via BeepBox.co.

3.  I added a UI at the top of the screen near the scores that displays the player's health.

Created by Ian Q. Pope using a combination of homemade assets as well as assets provided by Brian Winn.
